website_summaries.verdict: Conveniently sized, this countertop ice maker puts out a serious amount of ice in a short time period.
pros: Makes up to 26 pounds of ice in 24 hours
Includes compressor that helps keep machine cool
cons: Drain can be challenging to access

customer_reviews.title: Igloo ice maker
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasts around 18 months and you will get no help from Seller or Igloo. They just told me to throw it away and buy a new one that there are no replaceable parts but you can find refurbished ones online!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo M.

customer_reviews.title: NFG
customer_reviews.text: Total JUNK!! Bought this back on June 27th 2017 and it Crapped out on August 1st 2018. ReGodDamnDiculous!! I had an $80 machine b4 this one that lasted over 2 yrs. I spent extra this time hoping for a longer-term solution. WRONG!! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR $$$. If you're gonna get anything go for the cheapest way available. They're ALL THE SAME THING as far as I can see. Maybe there's something better that lasts longer but I haven't found one thus far. VERY DISSATISFIED & DISAPPOINTED!! 👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loving this item. We’re using it in our travel trailer at the moment. No more buying ice! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Shelia G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use the machine needs to be reset almost hourly and once it does produce ice cubes it doesn't keep them cool enough. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sooo many books...

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend this model to anyone
customer_reviews.text: There is no difference in size of ice cubes, either small or large setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s been helpful, but i don’t love it.
customer_reviews.text: While it may make 26 lbs per day, the capacity to hold more than 10 ice cubes at a time is limited. So, standing by to empty the ice to keep it making more is necessary. Always need to empty it and put ice in freezer or it melts in the ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Azzarello

customer_reviews.title: Cubes are QUITE small, even on the large setting ...
customer_reviews.text: Cubes are QUITE small, even on the large setting. Also, there isn't a refrigerated section for the cubes to sit while the machine works. My experience has been that by the time the bin is filled, the first few batches of cubes are soft/wet, and when I put them in the freezer, they freeze up into a solid block. I can break them apart with a knife, but sometimes it's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: RILONGBOARDER

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to free myself from ice runs at the grocery store. What a great little machine! Super easy to use, produced 8lbs of ice in a couple of hours. Strongly recommend purchasing ice bags if you want to make & store ice conveniently. Great way to have ice on demand if you were smart enough to not get an ice producing fridge (cause those are notorious for leaking). The ice maker is very simple to operate and quite compact. You do need to be around to monitor and empty the ice tray every 20 minutes or so. I do marathon ice making, fill up an 8 lb ice bag and then clean the machine out until next use.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Trail

customer_reviews.title: "Add Water" light is on and won't turn off
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use the "add water" sensor is clearly broken. I have a full reservoir of water and the light stays on and won't make ice. Reading other reviews this appears to be common in a lot of ice makers. No way to fix this
customer_reviews.author: GMoney21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: New favorite thing. I drink a lot of water and I use a ton of ice. I bought one of these for my office. That one squeaks really loud when it's running low on water. However, I bought another one for my yacht. I love it. We can have lots of ice all the time. It's super quick.
customer_reviews.author: Launi

customer_reviews.title: Just one issue
customer_reviews.text: So I like this ice maker because it makes ice super fast, and it’s really pretty. BUT I do have one issue with it...the fresh ice gets pushed into the basket and is supposed to fall in so it can make more, but most of the time it doesn’t fall and the sensor gets blocked so it thinks it’s completely full. So no more ice gets made. I get that it’s not abnormal, but it happens a lot more than I think it should. As far as the noise, I don’t think it’s too noisy. I notice it, but nothing you can’t get used to.
customer_reviews.author: MF2007

customer_reviews.title: Doese what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Our crappy Samsung fridge ice maker quit so we bought this as a replacement. I researched tirelessly and decided on this ice maker. Pros- quick ice making Cons- Noisy Ice doesn't freeze very hard and melts quickly. We dump the ice in a bucket in our freezer to make it harder but then it freezes in a clump. We tried it in our RV but decided that it was easier to keep a small cooler and buy ice.
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases for summer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ice maker. It’s soft ice so it melts quicker. I like to eat ice so this is perfect for me. It makes ice quickly. I store the ice in gallon ziploc bags in my freezer. The only thing I don’t like is the drain at the bottom is kind of difficult to unplug and plug for me because I have a lot of joint pain. It is a bit challenging for me. Other than that, this is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa RR

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy because it does not continue working after using it for two months!
customer_reviews.text: The portable ice maker worked for less than two months before the water pump started making an extremely loud noise to where it finally quit working. When you call for a warranty claim Curtis who makes these units make it almost impossible to submit a claim! Buy a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine but...
customer_reviews.text: These are great ice making machines.. This is our third one. They make ice fast, are reasonable with noise and make the right amount of ice for two people for daily use. Wife and I use them for the house and the RV.. Overall these are great machines but expect them to last less than a year. We have gone thru three in two years and always purchased the 2 years insurance offered by Allstate thru Amazon. Pays for itself as the machines do see to last 6 months to just under a year before something fails. Usually the compressor. Just my experiences..
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice maker
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was needing. Very easy to use and quick for making ice. this is the perfect size for us. We run it for a few hrs and refill our freezer and are good to go again till the weekend. There is not much noise. I would refer this if you are not needing high bulk ice for coolers. It is perfect for smaller household.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: What a LIFE SAVER! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a life safer! We are remodeling our home and living in a temp situation in the "granny flat" so the only refrigerator is downstairs and no ice maker hooked up! This was easy to get out of the box ... remove the packing/shipping tape ... read the directions and it was making ice within minutes!!! It does make a little more noise than say an ice maker inside a refrigerator - but it's been well worth it! Makes ice fast too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The last ice maker we had lasted two years. This one lasted one before the metal rods in it stopped freezing water. While it lived with us, this machine was loud and never registered any loss of weight as ice melted from the basket. We’d go to refill a glass, and the recently full basket would be half melted while the “Ice Full” light remained lit and ice production had long since ceased. I might recommend this to a camel. Could last longer if you only need a cold beverage once in a great while.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Ice wherever you need it!
customer_reviews.text: Iced tea on a hot summer day, icy cold press in the morning, a rum and coke while sitting out on the porch... and you can even have your ice stay chilled and ready to go while sitting at the patio table. Perfect for entertaining in whatever room. I don't need to make ice in one place and shuttle it continually to another place, I can make ice on demand, on location. I really missed my ice maker in my door for a while, but now I think I was missing out before!
customer_reviews.author: A F

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, was able to repair after two years
customer_reviews.text: Best product. So far over a year without any problems. Just have to clean with vinegar. Like the blue color. Note 4/25/2020: it lasted from Christmas 2017 to April 2020 and performed well until it didn’t. May want to consider the 4 year warranty, it may be worth it. Second Note: We were able to repair it at home; it was just a small toggle switch that needed to be replaced. A little soldier and we are good to go again. Hopefully for another two years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Latchford

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on January 27th and it was delivered in the beginning of February. I really liked it and we used it several times a week until last night when I turned it on and it began making a very loud grinding noise and would not work any longer. As much as I liked it, and very disappointed that it stopped working after only 3 months and it can't be returned. So this was a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It does technically make ice
customer_reviews.text: Well it does technically make ice, but then it melts as fast as it makes it. It makes nice bullet shaped hollow ice pretty quickly. Just wish the ice didn't come out wet and melting. And if it sits in the ice catching basket it turns into a large glob of dripping wet ice. I don't know if I got a bad one or if they are all like that, but I can't recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Disposable - 6 months Use
customer_reviews.text: 6 months - that's all we got from this. Frigidaire should relabel this as disposable. Got 6 months of ice, making about weekly, then the unit all of a sudden started leaking water all over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: D & K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this little ice maker when it arrived. Sadly it worked for less than 4 months then it stopped making ice. I went through the warranty company and it was a little strange (had to cut off the plug, destroy the unit and send pics then wait to see if they approved a replacement). I got the replacement but again it only lasted about 3 months and stopped working. It started leaking what I guess was refrigerant and no longer made ice. I didn’t bother contacting the warranty again because it was such a hassle. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to have ice all the time. I don't expect this to live longer than a year but for $100 :) who cares ! This ice does not get super hard as my past ice maker
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work, gift to my daughter, she notified me a few weeks ago that it doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return this as it doesn't work anymore. Had a chat with Nicholas and he suggested a way to make it work. My daughter tried what he suggested and it still doesn't work. Please issue an RA (Return Authorization} asap. Thank you...... Frances Paione ARE YOU GOING TO ACKNOWLEDGE THIS COMPLAINT OR JUST IGNORE IT............SURPRISE AT AMAZON!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FPAIONE

customer_reviews.title: Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our RV. Was skeptical at first thinking it probably would not be able to make enough ice to fill our needs but was I wrong. Not only did it make plenty of ice, in a reasonable time the ice also seems to last longer. Will definately be keeping this unit!
customer_reviews.author: odie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker didn't even last a year. And too expensive to send back to the manufacturer under warranty. It's a shame that no one will do anything about it when you spend that kind of money. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great buy=Price Great easy to use Keep this upstairs for my husband who cant get up and down the stairs and drinks lots of Ice water saves me from running up and down all day makes enough for him the only thing is if power goes off you must re-start it will not start making ice unless you do. Besides that great buy Two sizes of cubes to choose from to Love it
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I work together in a small office. Just the 2 of us so we don't need a big refrigerator with ice maker. We have a small refrigerator - big enough to hold some water bottles and soft drinks, coffee cream, etc. But sometimes you just need ice with an afternoon drink. I've been looking at these for a while and finally decided to pull the trigger. Told the husband after the fact and he wanted to know why I bought that - we don't need it. I am here to tell you he is in awe of this icemaker! We use it everyday. He absolutely loves it! Why didn't I get it sooner? hehe
customer_reviews.author: Boerne Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for Christmas, it’s doesn’t work, the coils inside aren’t even cool, it won’t make ice at all. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to replace the ice-maker on the refrigerator that never works.......
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Product came in quickly and with no damage. Daughter-in-law was thrilled with getting it for Christmas. When I spoke with her next and ask how she liked it she told me it was moved into the garage because it was so loud. Works fine but just unbearably loud. She she wished someone had reviewed it as being loud prior to putting it on her wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Severina Parker

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Handy.
customer_reviews.text: I love ice. This is a very heavy, handy machine. I think it is worth it for my camper even though it takes up a good chunk of counter. The ice cubes are a cute little size. And depending on the ambient temperature and humidity the ice can be wet.
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker works well for me and my husband. It makes plenty of ice for us. It was so easy to use, I got one for the office. About 10 of us use ice everyday and the ice maker doesn't have any trouble keeping up with our ice needs. It is a little noisy and it gets "confused" at times about whether it has enough water. But, I can turn it off and turn it back on to get it back on track.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie H. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is perfect for my husband and I. It's quiet and perfect size. It's small and does not take up a lot of space. I have it sitting on my kitchen countertop. This is way better than having to buy bags if ice. No more struggling. You just have to make sure you keep your ice scooper safe from getting dirty to avoid getting bacteria in your ice.
customer_reviews.author: z_gar.z.a

customer_reviews.title: Good working ice maker.
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker has come in handy. It makes ice as expected however it is very noisy at times and it rattles a lot. I have to hit the sides to stop if from vibrating. Once it stops then the performance of this machine is really good. It makes ice in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Makes ice super fast! We use ours daily because our fridge ice maker can't keep up with our family so it will be interesting to see if it will last longer than the last one we had. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: K Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It's a Frigidaire !
customer_reviews.text: Nary a problem one...has 2 settings for cube size. Small setting a little too small but large is just right. Pretty quick on the make, and noise level not even a issue. Thanks Frigidaire
customer_reviews.author: 4merTxn

customer_reviews.title: No impressed. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: In fairness to this review, our package was delivered upside down in our package room so the performance could be tied to the freon from that. But this made super small ice that instantly started to melt in the storage unit. I returned after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Maddock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: It surprise me how quickly this makes ice and it makes a lot of ice as long as you have ample water in it. I took it camping with me on a hot day, had it plugged into my generator, and it made lots of ice and worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a single family.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for a single family home. But if you don't like paying the electric bill this would be a no good product. It takes about 4 hours before you can get a nice amount of ice. I liked it and I would recommend this ice maker to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Jamillah harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I ordered this because the ice maker went out on my fridge and this was less expensive than having a new one put in the fridge. It does exactly as it says. I use filtered water, fill the tank turn on ice maker and within 30 minutes have ice.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not what I dream of it being. Lord it's noisey. I thought I had a animal in the room.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps losing its place . I have to cut it off to reset the machine. The place does set correctly. You may have to weggle it as the water empty light comes on. I'm glad I got the insurance. It says it making little Cubs but doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Marston G Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Makes plenty of ice and I love that ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Makes plenty of ice and I love that it has 2 sizes to pick from
customer_reviews.author: MC1983

customer_reviews.title: Ice ice baby
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker single handily saved my marriage. My husband and I used to fight over ice. We never had room in the freezer for it. But now it doesn’t matter!! We have ALL THE ICE!
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: exactly like ice maker it is replacing.
customer_reviews.text: Last Ice maker (igloo a bit noisy, but ran excellently.) This is designed the exact same, display and all. I am soooooooo looking forward to having ice again. This is a tad quieter til the ice drops into an empty bucket. Love it already.
customer_reviews.author: mphflame

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice fast and it's quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for a few months only. Fast and quiet. Makes a lot of ice quickly. Well insulated. Easy to clean. Compact for counter top. Am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: Always have ice
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Our Samsung ice maker broke down multiple times and rather than buy a new refrigerator for $2000, we bought this table top ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: JRJ-Midlothian

customer_reviews.title: Slightly misleading
customer_reviews.text: Although it states it can make 26# of ice a day, the ice bucket is super small and it requires you to continually press the On button to keep it frozen AND make ice. It's ok for the moment and good for 2 cups of ice at a time, but don't think it's going to be enough for your guests cocktail hour.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Keeping cool
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great way to get more ice for the summer time coolers
customer_reviews.author: keno56

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for My Mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves loves Sonic ice. We decided to get this for her so we weren't always running to Sonic to get more ice. She can make it when she needs it. It is quiet and it can be taken anywhere there is an outlet. The only downside we have seen is that it isn't that pellet ice like Sonic. It is hollow so still soft, just different....that was my only disappointment in this product. Now to see if it can keep up with my mom!!! ;
customer_reviews.author: Megan Carey

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice very fast.
customer_reviews.text: Love this icemaker, it makes ice very fast, will be a great addition to our camper in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! It takes a long time for the ice. If you were having a party or gathering it would never keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This Frigidaire ice maker worked a little for about 20 minutes and the fan stopped working, I sent it back. The ice cubes never fully formed. Great idea if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K.

customer_reviews.title: NO complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect... I can assure you, you have nothing to worry about when purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Chewable Ice
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice machine. I am an ice chewer. And the ice cubes set to small are the perfect soft crunchy ice. If they're set to large it makes good ice for drinks. The ice does melt a little fast which isn't a problem for me because I eat them anyways. But if your looking for hard ice cubes to really keep your drink cold this isn't the machine for you!
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Is not a freezer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Does not make ice quickly, very noisy, hollow ice chips, cannot store ice over whole day (not sealed).
customer_reviews.author: MITSCIENTIST

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Great little ice machine.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is it is a little noisy when the ice drops. I like to let the ice melt a little and then it is very chewable. I still haven’t figured out the difference in the small and large size because it seems to be the same no matter what setting it is in.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a RV!
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is perfect for our RV. It fits easily on a roller cart, enabling us to save precious counter space. It only makes 9 small ice cubes at a time but I continue to run it until I am able to fill the ice container in our small freezer. We are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working correctly after only 6 weeks! Can’t return on amazon at this point. Contacting manufacturer is a ridiculous list of photos and videos!!! I wish I’d spent a little more and bought it at a retail store, so I could just take it in and return it!!! SO VERY dissatisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: awech

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and son-in-law. It's perfect. They use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: SariMae

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Who wants to Buy ice? This machine is beautiful, easily put away, bought for camping and use at home too, quick & saves tray space in freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Ice and very small amounts dispensed Takes forever
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this! Does not do what it says it does!!! Makes hollow ice that melts faster than it can spit another out. Returned the item !
customer_reviews.author: Weasel0669

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT, counter top ice maker. We purchased the blue color and it is gorgeous! The ice is bite-sized so even my children can enjoy that! It fills quickly, works great, and was a fantastic purchase! It also came with an ice scooper. My husband was THRILLED when he opened this for Father's Day and everyone has been enjoying it since!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McFive

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a lot of cubes in a minimal amount of time and you can change the size of cubes as well which is nice. Will definitely come in handy during summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Got ice?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GREAT! We moved into an apartment so yes, it is noisy but it makes so much ice everyday. Great little ice maker for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: RNme09

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These ice machines (all brands) tend to last us about one year. They function well until they just don't
customer_reviews.author: Sherree Hussey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 weeks then it crapped out DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice quickly
customer_reviews.text: It makes ice amazingly fast. I haven't had it long enough to comment on the longevity. It appears well made and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice but cubes are too small and a bit slow. I have another ice maker so I have some experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Our fridge ice machine could not keep up with demand, so we tried out this product. So far it has been great. it refills quickly and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice really fast!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my husband. We have a large family and get together frequently for dinners. This made its first batch of ice in about six minutes every six minutes thereafter. It's a great little machine to help supplement our refrigerator ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Tilzer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for making ice quickly
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our loft to make ice for drinks. It works well and doesn't require refilling very often. Highly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had an Igloo brand for years but it finally died. Read review on this one and decided to purchase it. If is almost the same as the igloo but it is really noisy. It also dumps far fewer ice cubes than it should. They stack up at the dump point so the machine thinks it is full when it is not. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: g
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little ice maker. I am impressed at how rapidly it makes ice. I use a lot of ice and when the tray is full I put the cubes in a ziplock bag and store in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Move on you don't want this one
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of went with the reviews on this one!! You're better off giving your hard earned money away to your neighbors, their appreciation will last longer than this thing! It didn't last 3 months before it started making a god awful noise every time the pump comes on. KEEP YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Pate

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker works perfectly for Me. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray from rosemead

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice super fast !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this ice maker less than a week, and am already impressed. It is a little smaller than previous models, which is OK. I love the blue color, and the fact that it makes ice in less than ten minutes. I hope it keeps up the great work !!!
customer_reviews.author: christina hughes

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: I like that it constantly makes ice but it is kind of noisy. Not the best for a quiet office
customer_reviews.author: Trena Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The cubes are smaller than our previous one, but we still like the size and cubes are made extremely fast! Would recommend...love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money makes ice pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Needs water refills more frequently than my last machine, and only one setting for ice size and beeps more than necessary to indicate ice full, need water etc. All in all a nice product, just more quirky than what I was used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyne

customer_reviews.title: Works great, only one minor issue
customer_reviews.text: Works great upstairs at my bar where I don't have room for a traditional ice maker. Only gripe I have about it is the fact that the small and large ice cubes are essentially the same size, so there's no real option to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: It obviously had been used and not reported as so.
customer_reviews.text: This came in a box with a hole cut in it and there were no packaging materials, the product’s plastic covering was in a wad in the bottom of the box, and there was absolutely no paperwork, instruction book, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: For not being a commercial grade this machine has helped me so much! Its fantastic! Especially if you want a drink and you don't want to drive or wait hours for the ice tray!
customer_reviews.author: Lynzy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Worth the price. Happy with product so far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member and they absolutly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought. The first lasted about a year this one is not working correctly now. It makes a terrible noise . DO NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. Soft ice fast. Perfect margarita ice. It is a bit noisy though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May and already it is not working and has to be replaced. Loved it but having to replace it in less than 6 months is a little ridiculous.

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working in a Month
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use at school during the day. It quit working after one month!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works just like it’s supposed to and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my mom for Christmas. It works just like it’s supposed to and she loves it. Would recommend if you are huge ice lovers like our family is.

customer_reviews.text: Yes there is a different in name brands of ice makers, this one works in all temperatures

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very convenient for me not to have to buy ice any more. Love it

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well while it lasted, but it's pretty expensive to only make ice for 6 months.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for personal use/a few people. Don’t expect to yield enough to accommodate a party. Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Must buy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So many of these out there I was having analysis paralysis. Saw my brother had bought a Frigidaire so picked this one up. Will need another one when kid takes this to college next year.

customer_reviews.text: At least they're prompt if you have to return the item because you already ordered a duplicate

product_meta.title: Frigidaire EFIC108-SILVER Counter top Portable, 26 lb per Day Ice Maker Machine, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SILVERWhen you hear the Frigidaire name, immediately you think of quality built, affordable kitchen products. Well the folks at Frigidaire are at it again. Introducing the counter Top Ice Maker! Are you hosting this year’s family BBQ? Well then you better get your hands on this ice maker! The LED design allows you to check the ice level and choose the size of ice cubes you want. The cover with the large see through window makes it easy to see the ice basket and shovel. The air outlet will keep this thing going through the whole party and when it’s time to clean up you can easily empty the ice maker with the drain plug. All this from the makers at Frigidaire, the #1 leader in refrigeration!
feature_bullets: 26 Lbs ice maker - Make Ice in 6 Minutes
Modern Design: Able to see through window for process monitoring & ice level checking. Stylish design and neutral color fit with anywhere
Great for parties, RV and Camping
Easy to Set Up and Start Using Right Out of the Box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars517 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
